messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 977
messages.msgSnippet: The bad news is that Bush has stopped funding for organizations world-wide that support exactly this. Contrary to what many people believe, the U.S. is NOT
messages.messageBody:
The bad news is that Bush has stopped funding for organizations world-wide
that support exactly this. Contrary to what many people believe, the U.S. is
NOT funding abortions, it was funding organizations that educate women on
birth control.

In a message dated 2/3/01 3:56:26 PM Central Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
Anyway, the good news is that there is an easy way to reduce abortion and it
is working: access to birth control. This has a long-term effect in that
women who are not overwhelmed at a young age by the responsibility and
expense of children are able to finish their education, settle into a
stable
relationship and then have kids they can support emotionally and
financially.

Here's to a better and more compassionate world
